name: skelly-jelly
description: Your ADHD companion with a melty skeleton friend

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:rust
scripts.test: npm run test:rust && npm run test:ts
scripts.start:full: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run start:gamification" "npm run start:figurine" "npm run start:rust"
scripts.start:ts-only: npm run build:ts && concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run start:gamification" "npm run start:figurine"
